desc: The MUGS doing the can-can.I am selling ceramic mugs with about 100 different sayings. HOW do you make a basic product interesting, fun and different from the competition?SCENEAn eloquent stage, think the 1920’s…Lots of gold and RED velvet drapesWe are going to have the animated dancers to Offenbach’s the Can-Can. It is iconic music that is such a kick. If we do this right, if could go viralThe dancers , Dancing mugs with a BIG fro-fro skirt over mug. HOT neon colors. Above the waist, INVISIBLE, EXCEPT the gloves. (think Michael Jackson). This should be fun and save a lot of time/money making the top of skirt and the dancers faces. While they are doing the can-can, they are holding hands…NOW, ALL in black light. Your creative input it very welcome. The wackier, absurd the better.[url removed, login to view]:Offenbach_-_Orpheus_in_the_Underworld_-_Overture,[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]

desc: 1) It should have a login page able to login in different options, wechat, facebook, google, twitter, alipay, email, phone number and separate signup option from my app2) It should have banking operation like deposit, withdraw and transfer as in airtel money , paytm, alipay and wechat3) Transfer of money and receiving of money option should be available only for properly registered users with aadhar card, bank account, or credit card and for other country users must have passport registered with the app in common.4) Other country people can receive and transfer funds to any country with a limit of only 500 USD a day with properly registered identity of passport and other identity of bank account from home country or the country he is working.5) Registered people without bank accounts will be able to transfer only 50 USD per day to other countries from his available wallet.6) Users without KYC will be able to receive or send only 50 USD per day from him available wallet.7) Every user with proper registered bank and identity is eligible to receive 1.5% interest per month on his available balance in wallet.8) Referring proper registered user will be eligible to receive 2.5% interest per month on his available balance in wallet (I will change this option in future).9) Every transaction should be secured10) Must have option to use this wallet to buy anything or pay for anything while shopping at any store or online or using taxi11) Must have shopping option within app like flipkart, aliexpress, ola, uber, railway tickets, hotels, (this option is not important)12) Must have chatting option, make friends, multiple video calling, multiple voice calling, group chat, group calling, share everyday moments with likes and comments all same as in wechat,13) Share files, videos, pictures all same as in wechat14) web based login as in wechat and whatsapp15) Desktop version of the app to login only with QR code and no other options should be provided16) Option to have Multi vendor e-commerce for proper registered users just like paytm have both options17) Should have stickers sending option as in wechat and hike app.18) Organs, Blood, food and clothes donars to few genuine foundation which I recommend.19) All donars should receive digital identity card generated online instantly with QR code on it after filling all the information and acceptancelet me know the approximate time and budget for it and what are other requirements to process further. Because currently nothing is ready and I have this idea to implement with better features.Your ideas are welcome to modify

desc: Hello,I have the source files of a Robot ("Suzy") in a number of different positions.  The model is fully rigged.   [source files in MODEL-FILES].This brief is to:- put Suzy in 6 more poses. The poses should look confused, drunk, stupid, and silly.- (check poses with me - low quality render ok).- save some PNG files of "high quality" rendering of Suzy, in the poses that are already there in MODEL-FILES.  The poses PNGs are also in folder "POSES-LOW_QUALITY".  The type of quality I want to have, via the new render is folder "TARGET-RENDER-QUALITY".- (check quality with me).- save the source files and send to me (in folder/zip called 'Suzy').- adjust my model (fully rigged) to look like the figure in "TARGET_ROBOT".  We will call her 'Deloris'.   Make sure Deloris looks quite different from Suzy!- (check Deloris model with me)- Output Deloris renders of all the poses in "POSES-LOW-QUALITY".
